sentences.en: A tsar was a living icon, invested with deep historical and religious significance.
sentences.cn: 沙皇曾是活着的圣像，具有深远的历史和宗教意义。

sentences.en: As she tried on the new coat and hat, the tsar looked on admiringly.
sentences.cn: 皇后试穿新衣帽时,皇上在一旁美滋滋地看着.

sentences.en: General Motors and Chrysler will be forced into bankruptcy early next year if they do not present a government-appointed "car tsar" with viable restructuring plans, the White House warned today.
sentences.cn: 白宫今天警告道：如果通用汽车和克莱斯勒未能给在政府指派的“汽车沙皇”提供一系列的重组计划的话，他们在明年早些时候将会破产。

sentences.en: Household troops of the Tsar, these are formidable , well armoured elite Eastern European heavy cavalry.
sentences.cn: 沙皇卫队是王室成员的护卫部队, 装备精良,极为凶残,属于东欧精锐重装骑兵.

sentences.en: Kutuzov wrote to that effect to the Tsar.
sentences.cn: 库图佐夫亦曾如此禀报陛下.

sentences.en: Nicholas I, Tsar of Russia, was born the third son of Tsar Paul I.
sentences.cn: 俄国沙皇尼古拉一世诞生, 是沙皇保罗一世第三个儿子.

sentences.en: The Tsar visited his coIIection every morning.
sentences.cn: 沙皇每天早上都要看看他的收藏.

sentences.en: The tsar was just a paper tiger.
sentences.cn: 沙皇不过是一只纸老虎.

sentences.en: The White House has appointed its cyber tsar, following a seven month search.
sentences.cn: 经过长达七个月的寻找,华府终于找到了它的网络沙皇.

trans.tran_cn: 俄国沙皇，专制独裁者，“czar”的变体
trans.tran_en: a male ruler of Russia before
